description.p: Not much is known about this conclave, its members seems to walk the world at random, looking for people who need their expertise, something which they give freely. Their presence in combat is impossible to ignore, and they put themselves between whatever danger threatens their allies.

sheet.description: Their presence in combat is impossible to ignore, and they put themselves between whatever danger threatens their allies.

description.p: You gain conclave spells at the ranger levels listed.
Starting at 3rd level, you are the rock on which the wave of enemies break. You have advantage on any check or save made to resist getting moved or made prone.

sheet.description: You have advantage on any check or save made to resist getting moved or made prone.

description.p: At 3rd level, even the most powerful foes has a hard time striking true against you. When a creature hits you with an attack, you gain a +4 bonus to AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: When a creature hits you with an attack, you gain a +4 bonus to AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature until the start of your next turn.

description.p: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

sheet.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn

description.p: At 7th level, a creature under your watchful eye has their martial capabilities severely hampered as they always feel as you are just at the edge of their vision. A creature marked by your Hunter's Quarry feature has disadvantage on opportunity attacks as long as it is able to see you.

sheet.description: A creature marked by your Hunter's Quarry feature has disadvantage on opportunity attacks as long as it is able to see you.

description.p: At 11th level, you are always ready to intercept an enemy charge. When a creature moves within 10 feet of you, you can use your reaction to move up to 10 feet and make an attack with disadvantage against it. If it dealt damage to an allied creature before moving, you can instead make the attack with advantage.

sheet.description: When a creature moves within 10 feet of you, you can use your reaction to move up to 10 feet and make an attack with disadvantage against it. If it dealt damage to an allied creature before moving, you can instead make the attack with advantage.

description.p: At 15th level, few can surprise you, even while seemingly not aware of your surroundings. You are fully aware of your surroundings even while unconscious.

sheet.description: You are fully aware of your surroundings even while unconscious.

description.p: At 20th level, your presence is enough to keep any creature safe. As a bonus action, choose a creature within 30 feet that you can see. For 1 minute, as long as this creature is within 60 feet of you, it can't take any damage.
Once you use this feature, you cannot use it again until after you finish a short or long rest.
